name: TD FX
description:
Introduction

TD FX is a fast paced tower-defence game inspired by the auto-battler genre.

With your excellent tackling ability and multiple towers to buy it is up to you to fend off waves of enemies.

- Can you survive to the end?

Controls

Keyboard: Arrow keys, Z and X, P for pause
Controller: D-pad / Joystick,  A and B, Start for pause


Credits

Sebastian Lind
Follow me on Twitter
If you like the game and want to support me then it would be lovely if you buy it :)
